docs.snippet: The Steubenville employees have been placed on leave after they were charged in an investigation prompted by the rape of a 16-year-old girl, school officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Steubenville employees have been placed on leave after they were charged in an investigation prompted by the rape of a 16-year-old girl, school officials said.
docs.abstract: School superintendent and two district employees in Steubenville, Ohio, are placed on leave after being charged in an investigation prompted by the rape of a 16-year-old girl by two high school football players.

headline.main: Ohio: 3 at School District Put on Leave After Charges
headline.print_headline: Ohio: 3 at School District Put On Leave After Charges

docs.snippet: A 12-year, $4.9 billion deal that gives Rogers Communications the rights to all national hockey telecasts in Canada beginning next season surpasses the league’s agreement with CBC, TSN and a French-language cable network....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 12-year, $4.9 billion deal that gives Rogers Communications the rights to all national hockey telecasts in Canada beginning next season surpasses the league’s agreement with CBC, TSN and a French-language cable network.
docs.abstract: NHL announces a 12-year, $4.9 billion deal that gives Rogers Communications the exclusive rights to all national hockey telecasts in Canada beginning in 2014.

headline.main: N.H.L. Reaches Lucrative Telecast Deal in Canada
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Reaches Lucrative Telecast Deal in Canada

byline.contributor: Richard Sandomir and Ian Austen contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: What does “family” mean to you? Do you count only those bound to you by blood or legal ties, or do friends or other kinds of communities also fill some of the traditional role of family for you? What role does your family, however you define i...
docs.abstract: What does “family” mean to you? Do you count only those bound to you by blood or legal ties, or do friends or other kinds of communities also fill some of the traditional role of family for you? What role does your family, however you define it, play in your life in general?

docs.snippet: Britain's electorate won't choose to stay in the Union unless a less-Europe option is proposed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's electorate won't choose to stay in the Union unless a less-Europe option is proposed.

docs.snippet: Mr. Williams leaked mountains of internal documents in 1994, fueling lawsuits that resulted in an industry payout of billions of dollars to pay smokers’ medical bills....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Williams leaked mountains of internal documents in 1994, fueling lawsuits that resulted in an industry payout of billions of dollars to pay smokers’ medical bills.
docs.abstract: Merrell Williams Jr, former paralegal who leaked mountains of internal documents of the Brown & Williamson Tobacco Company in 1994, fueling lawsuits that resulted in an industry payout of billions of dollars to pay smokers’ medical bills, dies at age 72.

headline.main: Merrell Williams Jr., Paralegal Who Bared Big Tobacco, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: Merrell Williams Jr., 72; Bared Big Tobacco
